item.title: Sum and Product Puzzle solution
item.description: This is a translation of my article in a russian IT site Puzzle Solution Puzzle Two integers, A and B, each between 2 and 100 inclusive, have been chosen. The product, AÃ—B, is given to mathematician Dr. P. The sum, A+B, is given to mathematician Dr. S. They each know the range of numbers. Their conversation is as follows: P: "I don't have the foggiest idea what your sum is, S.
